parameters.name: ApiId
parameters.description: The specified API ID. This parameter must be specified together with GroupId and StageName.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The specified group ID. This parameter must be specified together with ApiId and StageName.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SecurityToken
parameters.description: The security token included in the WebSocket request header. The system uses this token to authenticate the request.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The environment name. This parameter must be specified together with GroupId and ApiId. Valid values:********

*   **RELEASE**
*   **TEST**

parameters.name: TrafficControlId
parameters.description: The ID of the throttling policy.

parameters.name: TrafficControlName
parameters.description: The name of the throttling policy.
